description: This file defines an ESLint configuration for a Next.js project using ES module syntax. It imports necessary modules, sets up compatibility configurations, and exports an ESLint config array.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns a directory name from a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a path.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Extends existing ESLint configurations with specified configurations.
